=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Garfield Show: All You Need Is Love & Pasta
Review Date: 2015/06/11
Store: -  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Romance
Product Description: ["Hearts, flowers and fur balls are in the air with The Garfield Show: All You Need Is Love (and Pasta). You'll have enough fun and laughter to last through nine lives and nine dishes of lasagna as everyone's favorite droll kitty meanders from one hilarious situation to the next. Whether he's fostering orphan birds, enduring John's quest for the perfect family portrait, or putting up a good front for Liz's parents, Garfield really does love his friends... maybe even more than lasagna. Maybe."]
Average Rating: 4.8

reference_summary:
Garfield and Friends: Behind the Scenes
Carl Ballantine  (Actor),     Victoria Jackson  (Actor),     Tom Tataranowicz  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, Fox TV, General
["He's furry! He's fat! He's all that \x96 and more!", "When he's not gobbling lasagna, taking up couch space or toying with his dog pal Odie, Garfield is busy being one hip Hollywood cat in these hilarious adventures hand-picked by creator Jim Davis! From hosting his own special about how cats are from out of this world (literally!) to animating his own cat cartoon to teaching kittens how to annoy their humans, Garfield is fantastically funny in this exclusive DVD! So bring home the humor, the wit and the fun of everyone's favorite fat cat!"]

Big Hero 6
Ryan Potter  (Actor),     Scott Adsit  (Actor),     Chris Williams  (Director),     Don Hall  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Kids & Family
["With all the heart and humor audiences expect from Walt Disney Animation Studios, BIG HERO 6 is an action-packed comedy adventure that introduces Baymax, a lovable, personal companion robot, who forms a special bond with robotics prodigy Hiro Hamada. When a devastating turn of events catapults them into the midst of a dangerous plot unfolding in the streets of San Fransokyo, Hiro turns to Baymax and his diverse group of friends -- adrenaline junky Go Go Tomago, neatnik Wasabi, chemistry whiz Honey Lemon and fanboy Fred -- who transform into a band of unlikely heroes. Bring home Disney's BIG HERO 6, featuring comic-book-style action and hilarious, unforgettable characters -- it's fun for the whole family!"]

**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **General Interests:** Continues to embrace animated comedies and family-oriented content, particularly valuing works that evoke nostalgia and warmth.
- **Media Formats:** Remains dedicated to DVDs, preferring to experience high-quality visuals and sound.
- **Humor Preference:** Enjoys lighthearted narratives featuring whimsical characters that foster joy and emotional connection, with an emphasis on heartwarming relationships.
- **Engagement with Content:** Appreciates behind-the-scenes insights and storytelling that deepen connections to characters and comedic situations.
- **Rating Tendencies:** Consistently rates content highly, often giving perfect five-star ratings, indicating a profound appreciation for his entertainment choices.
- **Core Values:** Values quality entertainment that seamlessly blends comedy and adventure, reflecting a strong preference for feel-good experiences suitable for all ages.
- **Recent Focus:** The latest interactions reinforce the user’s enthusiasm for humorous and heartwarming narratives that resonate emotionally, highlighting a preference for light-hearted adventures featuring beloved characters in delightful escapades.

Overall, the user continues to gravitate towards animated works that provide creativity, fun, and a nostalgic touch, showcasing an enduring love for content that brings families together through laughter and heartfelt moments.
